attributes.action: overturn the ridiculous sacking of Professor Nutt
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Professor Nutt acting in his role as advisor on the Misuse of Drugs gave his opinion on the government's action on scientific data. This is well within his remit, and his sacking clearly shows the government is less interested in the underlying statistical evidence behind a cause and more interested in people toeing the line, even those in place to advise the government on scientific issues, which are not matters of opinion.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
